## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->
1. There should be a switch to enable/disable filtering, it should be in search filed, and it's state should be saved when app is restarted;
2. If search returns no results when new symbol is entered in the keyword, app should prevent this symbol from input. ...

iterations.description: The connection filter UI lacks standard usability features such as a 'Clear' button to quickly reset the filter, and potentially visual enhancements for better clarity.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The connection filter UI lacks standard usability features such as a 'Clear' button to quickly reset the filter, and potentially visual enhancements for better clarity.
Approach: Add a 'Clear' button to the search panel layout (next to the search text box), implement its click handler to clear the search text, and ensure proper theming support for the new button.
